revised_title: James Short and Benjamin Wilson: A Portrait and Scientific Collaboration
tldr: This article discusses a portrait of James Short, a renowned maker of reflecting telescopes, attributed to Benjamin Wilson. The article explores their connection and collaboration, as well as the historical context of their work in the 18th century. It also provides insights into Wilson's scientific interests and his relationship with the Royal Society.
